ValidationRule.description: If Area of Focus is Audio Support/Integration other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), $Profile.Name <> "Zendesk Profile", NOT (ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "GlobalMeet - Phone")),
( ISPICKVAL(Area_of_Focus__c,'Audio Support') || ISPICKVAL(Area_of_Focus__c,'Audio Integration') ), ISPICKVAL(Country_of_Origin__c, '')|| ISPICKVAL(Phone_Type__c, '')|| ISPICKVAL(Meeting_Connection_Method__c, '')|| ISPICKVAL(Issue_Replicated__c, '')|| ISBLANK(Client_Carrier__c )|| ISBLANK (PGi_Conference__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Area of Focus is Audio Support or Integration, you must populate the following fields: Country of Origin, Phone Type, Meeting Connection Method, Client Carrier, Issue Replicated, & PGi Conference
